atham wishwa widyalawala deshana ada (12) wanawita aarambha kirimata hakiwanu athi bawada ese nomathi nam labana sanduda (15) ho bandada (17) wanawita aarambha kirimata hakiwanu athayi hethema wishwasaya pala kaleya.me athara ee mahatha sandahan kale adala karunu sambandhayen salaka balime di amathi mandalaya, wishwa widyapa prathipadana komishama, upakulapathiwarun samanga wruththiya samithi sakachcha kala bawayi.wangakiwa yuthu rajayak washayen kisiyam ramuwak thula watup wadikara thibena bawa sihipath kala basil rajapaksha mahatha aacharya mandalayata sathutu wiyahaki mattame yamak rajaya itukara thibena bawada me warjanaya awasan wu pasu kanagatu wana pirisakda sitina bawa prakasha kaleya.wishwa widyala sandaha athulathkara ganima pramada wima, usaspela uthrapathra balima pramada wima athulu gatalu rasak pawathina bawa penwadun ee mahatha ee wenuwen wishala karyabharayak apa siyalu denatama pawarena bawada ee sandaha wana siyalu parshawayan awanka uthsahayen katayuthu kirimen athapasuwu karyayan sampurnakara ganimata hakiwanu athayi wishwasaya pala kaleya.me gataluwe di dinaka ho dekaka wisandumak nowa digu kalina wisandumak labadennata rajaya nirantharayen uthsaha kala bawa sandahan kala basil rajapaksha mahatha ema mathaye siti siyalu parshawayanta thama sthuthiya pirinamana bawada kiya sitiyeya.me awasthawata sahabhagi wu usas adyapana amathi es.bi disanayaka mahatha sandahan kale wishwa widyala aacharyawarunge wruththiya samithi gataluwa sambandhayen wiwidha parshawayan samanga dirgha washayen sakachcha kala bawada awasanaye aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahathage madihath wima matha eya sarthakawa awasan kirimata hakiyawa labunu bawathya.wruththiya samithi kriyamargaya aarambhaye sita me dakwa kalaya ye eya wisanda ganima sandaha wiwidha parshawayan katayuthu kala aakaraya, sakachcha kirima athulu karunu sambandhayen dirgha lesa karunu dak wu amathiwaraya wishwa widyala aacharyawarun wiwidha illim kara thibu bawada ee pilibandawa sadharana lesa wisandum labadun bawada sandahan kaleya.usas adhyapana amathyanshaye lekam aacharya sunil jayantha nawarathna, janamadhya amathyanshaye lekam aacharya charitha herath, wishwa widyala prathipadana komishan sabhawe sabhapathi mahacharya gamini samaranayaka, rajaye prawruththi departhamenthuwe adhyaksha janaral mahacharya aariyarathna athungala saha aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaye adhyaksha janaral mahacharya sunanda madduma bandara mahathwaru athulu pirisak me awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha..

ada siya 70 wani janma dinaya samarana mahinda rajapaksha siya deshapalana jiwithaya arambauwe baha thorana wiye sita siya piyawu pasukaleka wadabalana idam amathiwarayada washayen katayuthu kala di. ee. rajapakshaya samangaya.sirima bandaranayaka rajaya magin nawa aandukrama wyawasthawak 1972 idiripath kirimedi ema yojanawa pilibada mul yojanawa 1970 juli masa parlimenthuwata idiripath kale mahinda rajapakshaya.
